downloadTitle: FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint - Adding Structure to Unstructured Content for Enhanced Findability
downloadDescription: This white paper describes best practices to improve search experience by creating metadata on-the-fly with FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint.
detailsSection: This white paper describes best practices to improve search experience by creating metadata on-the-fly with FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint.
systemRequirementsSection: • Requirements: To download and read a white paper, you must have Microsoft Word.
installInstructionSection: Click Download, and then save the file to your computer. Open the file in Word to read and print it.
